{{title|Symbol Index (removed)}}
{{cpp/symbol index/navbar}}

This page tries to list all the symbols that were available from the {{lt|cpp/standard library}} in the namespace {{c|std}} or in the scope of a scoped enumeration or a class, but removed in following standards. The symbols are written as follows:
*Function names with {{tt|()}}.
*Templates with {{tt|&lt;&gt;}}.

Member names that are still available in other types are not listed here.

==Removed in C++11{{nbsp|3}}[[#Removed in C++14|C++14]]{{nbsp|3}}[[#Removed in C++17|C++17]]{{nbsp|3}}[[#Removed in C++20|C++20]]{{nbsp|3}}[[#Removed in C++23|C++23]]{{nbsp|3}}[[#Removed in C++26|C++26]]==

===Notes===
The removed names are considered reserved and may be reused for other facilities in future Standard library revisions.

Names reserved as members for previous standardization may not be used as a name for object-like macros in portable code.
